description: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) SP 800-53 Rev. 5 provides a standardized approach for assessing, monitoring and authorizing cloud computing products and services to manage information security risk. These policies address a subset of NIST SP 800-53 R5 controls. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/nist800-53r5-initiative ref: https://csrc.nist.gov/pubs/sp/800/53/r5/upd1/final and https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r5
Comprehensive data protection law regulating personal data processing within the EU. ref: https://www.azadvertizer.net/azpolicyinitiativesadvertizer/7326812a-86a4-40c8-af7c-8945de9c4913.html
